name: Truck Driver Pro 2: Real Highway Traffic Simulator Game 3D
name_original: Truck Driver Pro 2: Real Highway Traffic Simulator Game 3D
description:
Hey hey, good buddy.  Back up and start haulin'.  Were back with the next installment of truck driver pro.

16 RACE COURSES
Two different settings with 8 tracks on each setting.  See how fast you can beat them all.  Real Road conditions - wind, traffic, guardrails.  Watch out for the cops!

REAL TRUCK DAMAGE
Don't get too much damage or your truck will start to smoke.  You know what they say about smoke - it aint good when your haulin stuff in a big rig.

REAL TRUCK SOUNDS
CB radio chatter as well as engine and brake sounds

MULTIPLE VIEWS
Choose either behind the wheel or from the rear.

EXCELLENT 3D GRAPHICS
The truck models used in the game are as true to life as you will find in the best truck racing games. The highway comes to life.  Watch out for that oncoming bus!  

EASY TO PLAY
High quality interface with all the elements a real truck driver would have.  Gas pedal, brake, distance to destination, 
CHALLENGING

SCORING FOR EACH TRACK
See if you can get a perfect score on each track

We feel this is one of the most realistic truck driving experience you will find for mobile devices.  Please don't be shy to leave us a review.  Love it or hate it - we would like to hear from you.  Good luck racing!
